ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Battery Systems is looking for an Engineering Technician who will be responsible for executing engineering test programs as related to the development of batteries for Apple products. You will have solid background with electronics, experience with testing, collecting and analyzing large amounts of data.

ul.li: Experience with basic electronics and electrical circuits.
Ability to execute complex, detailed test procedures with just enough input from engineering.
Familiarity with proper laboratory safety and housekeeping practices.
Must be able to follow all safety procedures
Must be able to work independently and as part of a team.

div.p: •Test cells and batteries with a variety of analytical lab equipment (examples: Automated Cycle Test Equipment, Measurement gauges, Impedance Meter, Voltmeter). •Execute detailed test procedures and accurately record/prepare test results and data analysis. •Configure and run complex test setups using high accuracy test equipment. •Assemble test fixtures and setups to facilitate product testing. •Maintain and troubleshoot test equipment. •Work closely with engineers to support battery development work. •Report status on a regular basis.
